articles.description: According to an ET Now report, 9.45 million shares changed hands in two bunch trades, which is about 16 per cent of the equity of the company.
articles.content:
New Delhi: Mrs Bectors Food Specialities tumbled as much as 9 per cent during early trade on Wednesday, following a reported block deal in the counter.
